General.Name: Sri Havisha Hospitality and Infrastructure Limited
General.Description: Sri Havisha Hospitality and Infrastructure Limited engages in hospitality and hotel business in India. It owns, operates, and manages hotel. The company was formerly known as Shri Matre Power & Infrastructure Limited and changed its name to Sri Havisha Hospitality and Infrastructure Limited in November 2016. Sri Havisha Hospitality and Infrastructure Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Hyderabad, India.
